Class GameCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameCharacter

  • public class GameCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
    The parent class of all the characters in the game except the player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameCharacter(int boardWidth, int xLoc, int yLoc, int direction)
      Constructs a GameCharacter with a given location and direction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the ImageIcon associated with the character

      Returns the height of the character image

      Returns the width of the character image

      Returns the x-coordinate of the character
      int getY()
      Returns the y-coordinate of the character

      Returns a Message object when the character is hit

      Returns the new x-coordinate of the character after it has moved

      Assigns the given value to dir

      Assigns the given value to xLoc
      void setY(int y)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCharacter

        public GameCharacter(int boardWidth,
                     int xLoc,
                     int yLoc,
                     int direction)
        Constructs a GameCharacter with a given location and direction
        Parameters:
        boardWidth - the width of the board that the character is on
        xLoc - the x-coordinate of the character
        yLoc - the y-coordinate of the character
        direction - the direction that the character will travel. Value of 1 or -1
